subject: Quick note: Secure a 20-minute discovery call
body:
Synthetic data can inherit or amplify biases present in the original data or generation process. 
Model debugging tools help identify and diagnose the root causes of poor model performance based on evaluation metrics. 
Rule-based synthetic data generation is limited by the expressiveness of the defined rules. 
Synthetic data can introduce bias if not generated carefully, which can negatively impact the performance and fairness of AI models trained on it. 
VAEs, or Variational Autoencoders, are generative models based on data compression principles.

Goal: Secure a 20-minute discovery call
